overview:
Mark has technical and business experience in IT management consulting. Before joining Nordic Venture Partners in 2007, Mark worked several years providing consulting services to the venture capital industry in Silicon Valley and U.S. government agencies in Washington, DC. He would conduct research and advise clients on new technologies and innovations which would have a strategic impact upon the business. Before working as a consultant, he was a naval officer specializing in communications, intelligence and engineering.

Mark has an MBA from Stockholm School of Economics and a BS in Systems Engineering from the U.S. Naval Academy.

email: mj@nordic.com
